law.text: All money paid to the State Treasurer for licenses and fees required by KRS 211.972 to 211.980 and regulations promulgated pursuant to KRS Chapter 13A shall be for the sole use of the cabinet and shall be in addition to any moneys appropriated by the General Assembly for the use of the cabinet.
law.history: Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 248, sec. 9, effective July 14, 1992. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 384, sec. 572, effective June 17, 1978. -- Created 1968 Ky. Acts ch. 82, sec. 7.
